IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.unequip_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.unequip_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.unequip_item @account_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t, @item_id dbo.id_t, @slot_id SMALLINT, @unequip_part TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET slot_id = @slot_id WHERE id = @item_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Equipments WHERE account_id = @account_id AND character_id = @character_id AND equip_part = @unequip_part
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
